column4: is anyone else having problems with their ranodm programs randomly stopping taking input from their keyboard on Gutsy?
I had that before on a 7.04 install on a different machine
never knew what took away the focus tho or how to fix it :-(
were you on amd64 by chance
yep AMD64 Athlon
with x64 ubuntu?
nope - 32 bit
ok, do you think reinstalling would help?
it may well do, I farted around a lot on that machine with XGL, Beryl and stuff and got random screen distortions after logging in and X would reset.....
I've only had Gutsy intalled on this machine for a couple of weeks, but I suspect it might have to do with all the upgrades from the beta/prebeta versions
I'd suggest a clean install - sorry, I don't like saying that! ;-)
*sigh* I was hoping that wouldn't be the answer ;)
did a Google search turn up anything?
nope, nothing on here or ubuntuforums either
disable compiz and see whether it still happens
no compiz running
I'm stumped
me too, I think a nice fresh reinstall is headed my way
aye - it's a pain, but it will likely sort it; just very annoying not to figure out what the cause was...
yeah, ive tried a bunch of stuff to no avail and it's really starting to bug me, esp in firefox
yep - when typing in the address bar etc...I know
